text:
BRB, off to Priceline.

If The Oscars is all about the dresses, then the Emmy Awards is all about the beauty. And this year’s show didn’t disappoint, with some of the most glammed up red carpet moments of the year.

While we doubt any of the celebs did their own makeup in the back of an Uber on the way, the products used to create their looks are surprisingly affordable.

In fact, most of them cost less than your favourite bottle of sav blanc.

Gina Rodriguez

This hairspray has been a staple since day dot and for good reason. The formula tames flyaways and provides lasting hold, which is probably why hairstylist Kristin Heitkotter used it on Rodriguez's low ponytail.

L'Oreal Paris Elnett Satin Hairspray Extra Strong Hold, $10.99

Gabrielle Union

To give Union natural-looking brows, makeup artist Fiona Stiles brushed on this clear brow gel to keep them from going rogue.

Tweezerman Browmousse, $25.95

Zoe Kravitz

Hairstylist Nikki Nelms got her hair inspiration from Kravitz's layered dress, starting the style with Dove's dry shampoo to simultaneously cleanse and add volume.

Dove Hair Therapy Refresh + Care Dry Shampoo, $9.99

Mandy Moore

Sidestepping the neutral lip trend, Moore went for a bold, fuchsia shade that will sell anyone on thinking pink. To get a long-lasting finish, makeup artist Jenn Streicher applied one layer, blotted it off, then added another coat.

Laura Mercier Velour Lovers Lip Colour in French Kiss, $40

Ariel Winter

Stylist Charles Dujic used this hairspray based in coconut oil and shea butter to create volume while flat ironing her slicked-back hair.

Marc Anthony Hydrating Coconut Oil & Shea Butter Volume Hairspray, $6.99

Ashleigh Austen is whimn.com.au's lifestyle editor and writes about everything from way-out wellness trends and workouts to genius beauty hacks and bang-on fashion buys. Fuelled by soy cappuccinos and carrots, she can quote nearly every episode from The Simpsons. Follow her for non-stop serious journalism (lol) on Instagram and Twitter.
title: The Bargain Beauty Products Celebs Actually Wore To The Emmys
